name: terraform-on-aws
description: Run Terraform over your Linux build agent host on AWS (with best practices).
author: Marceline Abadeer - e-Commerce Labs

inputs.name: templatesFilePath
inputs.label: Templates path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Terraform templates are stored (this path becomes the working folder).

inputs.name: destroyPlanBoolean
inputs.label: Mark as a destroy plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to mark this plan as a destroy plan.

inputs.name: saveGeneratedExecutionPlanBoolean
inputs.label: Save generated execution plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to save the generated execution plan (this plan can then be used with terraform apply).

inputs.name: useSavedExecutionPlanBoolean
inputs.label: Use saved execution plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to use the saved execution plan (from terraform plan).

inputs.name: variablesMultiline
inputs.label: Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Terraform variables (one per line to avoid incorrect configuration)

inputs.name: useVariablesFileBoolean
inputs.label: Use variables file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to use a variables file

inputs.name: manageStateBoolean
inputs.label: Manage state in S3
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to manage Terraform's state in S3

inputs.name: createBackendFileBoolean
inputs.label: Create a S3 backend file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to create a backend file specification (backend.tf), if not, a S3 backend specification must exist.

inputs.name: awsBucketTargeFolderString
inputs.label: AWS bucket target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: AWS bucket target folder where to upload/download Terraform's state.

inputs.name: terraformFilePath
inputs.label: Terraform path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Terraform executable is located, leave it empty if using environment variable (export).

inputs.name: validateTemplatesBoolean
inputs.label: Validate templates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to validate templates before using them ([terraform validate](https://www.terraform.io/docs/commands/validate.html)).

inputs.name: validateTemplatesVariablesBoolean
inputs.label: Validate templates' variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to validate templates' variables.

inputs.name: failOnStdErrBoolean
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to fail this task if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
